nodes.text: The Incisor Sidestep was a hyperspace route that connected Anoat—a planet in the Anoat sector—and Sullust—a planet in the Sullust sector—both in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. As such the route acted as a connection between the much longer Corellian Trade Spine and Rimma Trade Route, as Anoat and Sullust also sat on those routes respectively.

Sullust also acted as a junction from the Incisor Sidestep onto the secret Imperial Sanctuary Pipeline to the moon of Endor. The former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked the Incisor Sidestep as one of the "real" routes for smugglers to use, as oppose to the official ones, on a map that she included in the book that would eventually become known as the Smuggler's Guide.
The Incisor Sidestep was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
